Package uk.gov.gchq.palisade.cache.service.impl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackingStore
    This class defines the basic operations that any backing store to the cache service must define.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheCodecRegistry
    Maintains a registry of encoder and decoder function pairs (codecs) for various object types in to byte arrays.
    CacheCodecUtils  
    EtcdBackingStore  
    HashMapBackingStore
    A HashMapBackingStore is a simple implementation of a BackingStore that simply caches the objects in a ConcurrentHashMap.
    PropertiesBackingStore
    An example backing store implementation for BackingStore that supports basic file persistence.
    SimpleCacheObject
    Represents the basic cache entry that will be stored and retrieved from the backing store.
    SimpleCacheService
    The implementation for a CacheService that can persist various object types to arbitrary backing stores.
